sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-btn class="zona-item2">
    {{zona}}
  </b-btn>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: "ZonaItem2",
        props: ['zona', 'andamento', 'situacao']
    }
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
  @use "sass:math";

  $largura: math.sqrt(vmax+vmin)/122;
  .zona-item2 {
    font-family: $fonte;
    font-size: 2vmax;
    border-radius: 0;
    width: $largura;
    height: 8vmin;
    border: 0;
  }

  .zona-item2:hover {
    filter: brightness(1.5);
  }
</style>
